name: intact
description: A very lightweight data-binding library to create rich web application

scripts.release-patch: npm version patch && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: npm version minor && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.release-major: npm version major && git push origin --tags && npm publish
scripts.build: browserify src/index.js -t babelify -o dist/intact.js -s Intact && uglifyjs dist/intact.js -o dist/intact.min.js -m
